member.name: T:Sdl.Versioning.Company
member.summary: As part of rebranding the company name and folders change, the details of each companies locations are here.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.Company.Name
member.summary: The name of the company which is also used in paths.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.Company.InstallFolder
member.summary: The template that is used to populate the installation path for the company.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.Company.RegistryPath
member.summary: The template that is used to populate the registry path for the company.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.Company.ExeName
member.summary: The company specific name of the main executable of the product.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.Company.BaseProductName
member.summary: The company specific name of the main product of the product.

member.name: T:Sdl.Versioning.IStudioVersionService
member.summary: Abstraction used to obtain installation information for the current running Trados Studio instance

member.name: M:Sdl.Versioning.IStudioVersionService.GetInstalledStudioVersions
member.summary: Returns a list of all installed Trados Studio versions

member.name: M:Sdl.Versioning.IStudioVersionService.GetStudioVersion
member.summary: Returns information for the current Trados Studio installation

member.name: M:Sdl.Versioning.IStudioVersionService.StudioVersionSuported(System.Version,System.Version,System.Version)
member.summary: Returns true if the given version is supported or not

member.name: T:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion
member.summary: This class hold details specific to a Studio version

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.Version
member.summary: The product version string e.g. studio16Beta

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.PublicVersion
member.summary: The public version e.g."Trados Studio 2022"

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.InstallPath
member.summary: The installation location

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.ExecutableVersion
member.summary: The version of the Executable as a version type e.g. 16.0.0.1234

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.BaseProductName
member.summary: The Name of the product with no qualifiers e.g. Trados Studio this is usually used as a neutral folder name

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.PluginPackagePath
member.summary: The version dependent part of the plugin package location e.g 15 or 16 or 16Beta

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.PluginUnpackPath
member.summary: The version dependent part of the plugin contents when unpacked location e.g 15 or 16 or 16Beta

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.Edition
member.summary: The current Studio edition e.g. blank or beta, nightly etc.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.StudioDocumentsFolderName
member.summary: The Studio Documents folder name

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.ShortVersion
member.summary: The Studio short version e.g. 2021

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersion.Company
member.summary: The publishing company of the Studio edition e.g. Sdl or Trados

member.name: T:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersionService
member.summary: Service used to obtain installation information for the current running Trados Studio instance

member.name: M:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersionService.GetInstalledStudioVersions
member.summary: Returns a list of all installed Trados Studio versions

member.name: M:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersionService.StudioVersionSuported(System.Version,System.Version,System.Version)
member.summary: Determines if given version is supported or not
member.returns: True when the Studio version is within the given bounds

member.name: M:Sdl.Versioning.StudioVersionService.GetStudioVersion
member.summary: Returns information for the current Trados Studio installation

member.name: T:Sdl.Versioning.Versions
member.summary: This class defines Version specific constants for default items in studio.
Helper class with product infomation (released versions, copyright, etc.)

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.Versions.Copyright
member.summary: Returns CopyRight text

member.name: M:Sdl.Versioning.Versions.GetBuildVersion
member.summary: Returns the current build version

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.Versions.ProductDescription
member.summary: Returns the Product Description

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.Versions.BaseProductDescription
member.summary: Returns the Product Description without edition

member.name: F:Sdl.Versioning.Versions.KnownStudioVersions
member.summary: Returns a list mapping Studio Version Names with official Names

member.name: T:Sdl.Versioning.VersionedPaths
member.summary: Helper class with common settings locations.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionedPaths.UserAppDataPath
member.summary: Returns the path to store settings in a roaming user folder. e.g. C:\Users\*username*\AppData\Roaming\SDL\SDL Trados Studio\Studio16Beta

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionedPaths.LocalUserAppDataPath
member.summary: Returns the path to store settings in a non roaming user folder. e.g. C:\Users\*username*\AppData\Local\SDL\SDL Trados Studio\Studio16Beta

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionedPaths.UnversionedUserAppDataPath
member.summary: Returns the unversioned path to store settings in a roaming user folder. Settings shared between versions can be stored here. e.g. C:\Users\*username*\AppData\Roaming\SDL\SDL Trados Studio

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionedPaths.CompanyAppDataPath
member.summary: Returns the company path to store settings in a roaming user folder. Settings shared between all company applications. e.g. C:\Users\*username*\AppData\Roaming\SDL

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionedPaths.RetailProgramDataPath
member.summary: Returns the path to store settings in a per machine folder that is fixed per edition e.g. C:\ProgramData\SDL\SDL Trados Studio\Studio16 (never beta etc)

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionedPaths.ProgramDataPath
member.summary: Returns the path to store settings in a per machine folder. e.g. C:\ProgramData\SDL\SDL Trados Studio\Studio16Beta

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionedPaths.UserAppDataRegistry
member.summary: Returns a Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey in which to store per user settings e.g. HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\SDL\SDL Trados Studio\Studio16Beta

member.name: T:Sdl.Versioning.VersionResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionResources.Copyright
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Copyright Â© {0} SDL. All rights reserved..

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionResources.ProductDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Trados Studio {0}.

member.name: P:Sdl.Versioning.VersionResources.ProductDescriptionWithEdition
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Trados Studio {0} {1}.
